Documentation.content: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells.
Documentation.firstline: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells

Definition.name: gemm

Documentation.content: Extended Parallel Block Matrix Multiplication Module Implements: Result

param.name: transposeA
param.desc: Boolean indicating whether matrix A should be transposed before multiplying

param.name: transposeB
param.desc: Same as above but for matrix B

param.name: alpha
param.desc: Scalar multiplier for alpha * A * B

param.name: B_in
param.desc: Same as above for the 'B' matrix (multiplicand)

param.name: C_in
param.desc: Same as above for the 'C' matrix (addend). May be omitted.

param.name: beta
param.desc: A scalar multiplier for beta * C, scales the C matrix before addition. May be omitted.

Documentation.firstline: Extended Parallel Block Matrix Multiplication Module Implements: Result

Signature.sign: DATASET(Layout_Cell) gemm(BOOLEAN transposeA, BOOLEAN transposeB, value_t alpha, DATASET(Layout_Cell) A_in, DATASET(Layout_Cell) B_in, DATASET(Layout_Cell) C_in=emptyC, value_t beta=0.0)
